Parking Services have taken over the duties of traffic wardens where on and off street parking is concerned.

The Council's parking services staff always aim to enforce the Road Traffic Regulations Act 1984 fairly and equitably.

The Council believes that effective parking enforcement benefits public transport users, pedestrians, cyclists and responsible drivers.

The Parking Services team maintain ticket machines and meters as well as the signs and infrastructure of on and off-street car parking to make sure parking bays are always available and safe to use.

The team also aims to handle all enquiries in a courteous and helpful manner and respond to all written representations about excess charge notices.

Frequently Asked Questions regarding Fines

  • How do I pay a car park fine?
  • How do I dispute my car parking fine?
  • How much do I pay?

How do I pay my Car Park Fine?

You can pay your car parking fine in any of the following ways:

  • by credit/debit card you can pay on-line here link to online form with a credit card
  • in person - you should take your payment and car park fine ticket to any of our Customer Services Offices
  • by cheque - payable to enter council name and posted to enter address, please quote the billing number on the back of the cheque
  • postal order - you should post to enter address please quote the billing number on the back of the cheque

Please pay promptly.

If you pay your parking fine within 7 days of receipt, we will reduce the fee from £ enter amount to £ enter amount

How do I dispute my Car Park Fine?

If you wish to dispute your fine and have a valid ticket you should complete the on-line dispute form link to online form

Whilst we consider your disputed fine we will freeze the deadline date to pay until such time as we respond. If your dispute is unsuccessful we will expect payment within 7 days from the date of our response.

If you wish to dispute your fine on the basis of extenuating circumstances or because you are a Disabled Badge Holder, you should complete the on-line dispute form link to online form

How much do I pay?

Your car park fine will cost £ enter amount however if you pay your fine within 7 days of issue the cost it is reduced to £ enter amount.
